author: Al Jazeera
title: Iran urges US to free Iranian prisoners amid coronavirus pandemic
description: Foreign Minister Zarif accuses US of keeping innocent men jailed in 'horrific facilities' during COVID-19 outbreak.
content:
Iran's government has urged the United States to release Iranians held in US jails on sanctions-related issues due to fears about the coronavirus outbreak.
Iran's Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif accused Washington of holding a number of Iranians in its… [+1892 chars]
